channel.title: POCO F6 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: POCO F6 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.3.0.UNKRUXM Fastboot update for POCO F6 Pro Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F6 Pro Russia

Codename: vermeer

Version: OS1.0.3.0.UNKRUXM | 14.0

Size: 9.4 GB

MD5: 5e89f3fcdea325480990292d0d804839

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to June 2024. Increased system security.
[Cross-device intelligent connectivity]
New: Manage your nearby smart devices in Xiaomi Smart Hub which constantly updates in real-time based on device networking
New: Now you can use the hardware capabilities (e.g. screen or connectivity) of one device across compatible interconnected devices
New: Files, clipboard content, and other items can be moved effortlessly between devices
[Proactive intelligence]
New: Advanced AI technologies allow devices to assist you proactively (Beta)
New: A cross-device cognitive center combined with on-device AI algorithm deployment
New: Deep integration of large AI models empowers system apps
[Security]
Optimization: Introducing Wild Boost

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.5.0.UNKEUXM Fastboot update for POCO F6 Pro EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F6 Pro EEA

Codename: vermeer

Version: OS1.0.5.0.UNKEUXM | 14.0

Size: 9.0 GB

MD5: cc979a8458ead4f1916b337e1077eb44

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Optimization: Improved system resource recovery strategy when switching apps to enhance app smoothness
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Fix: Having too many notifications could cause the system to restart
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimizarion score calculation rules to improve accuracy
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.18.0.UNKCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K70 China

Codename: vermeer

Version: OS1.0.18.0.UNKCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.9 GB

MD5: 2575064a28f35de9e422068d589745d2

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Optimization: App launching algorithm speeds up app opening process
Fix: Some games crashed
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Home screen]
Optimization: The animation for swiping up in an app to go back to Home screen
Fix: Empty spots appeared in Second space Home screen layout in some cases
[Widgets]
Fix: An incorrect name for Travel assistant was shown in Recents
Fix: Items appeared blurry when switching between App vault and Recents
[Always-on display]
Fix: Crashes occurred in some cases
[Cross-device intelligent connectivity]
Optimization: Discovering devices in Xiaomi Smart Hub is faster now
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it
[Clock]
Fix: When setting alarm repetition, the checkbox was displayed abnormally when switching to Dark mode
[Calculator]
Fix: Mortgage loan calculator wasn't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation in Split screen
[Screen Time]
Fix: On rare occasions, time stats weren't displayed in Screen time
[Settings]
New: A major update to CarWith's visual experience, with redesigned styles for 6 different horizontal and vertical car system screen sizes. This update includes new cards for maps and music, and Mi AI conversation styles.
New: CarWith now offers enhanced personalization options, including wallpapers, backgrounds, card sorting, widgets, and more
Optimization: Enhanced CarWith navigation experience by supporting fullscreen map navigation and introducing a new floating navigation window
Optimization: CarWith connectivity and overall stability
[Security]
Fix: Disaster warning subscribed locations disappeared in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Text and notifications were displayed incorrectly for some languages under specific conditions

Download: Here
